Albert Laszlo Barabasi

January 2010

The century of the self was driven by Freud’s theories and ended up with the lifestyle business — the full control of our desires.

Barabási now invents the science of objectively understand and measure people, humanity.

This will spark the control of behavior. If the century begins — after the total control of unconscious — with the control of conscious how it will end?

Who will need our souls? Anymore?

This essay is about the world. With focus on values, control, desire, conscious, unconscious.
What To Pay For?
Fear
